alert.note: Alert for Brown; Calumet; Door; Kewaunee; Outagamie; Southern Oconto County; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:54PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Brown, northwestern Kewaunee, southern Door, northwestern Calumet, northeastern Winnebago, southern Oconto and eastern Outagamie Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles southeast of Gillett to 6 miles east of Pulaski to 10 miles east of Black Creek to near Menasha. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Bay, Bellevue Town, Kaukauna, Oconto and Bay Shore Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Calumet; Door; Kewaunee; Outagamie; Southern Oconto County; Winnebago
